ValidationRule.description: Only Channel campaign can be selected when creating or editing MLUR
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( Campaign__r.RecordType.Name <> 'Channel Campaign', Campaign__r.RecordType.Name <> 'Campaign 2.0' ), CONTAINS('DSG Partner', Campaign__r.Name) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Selected campaign is incorrect, or cannot be found, please contact your channel marketing team for assistance
